amendment.description: An amendment to revise funding levels in the bill by reducing the amount made available for "Corps of Engineers-Civil--Expenses", and increasing the amount made available for "Corps of Engineers-Civil--Construction", by $15 million.

action.text: Amendment (A055) offered by Mr. Lujan, Ben Ray (NM).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lujan, Ben Ray (NM) amendment (A055) Failed by voice vote.
